title: Select Committee on Citywide Mandatory Affordable Housing (MHA) - Special Meeting - Public Hearing
description:
Briefing and Public Hearing on CB 119184: AN ORDINANCE relating to Mandatory Housing Affordability (MHA); rezoning certain land and modifying development standards throughout the City, implementing MHA requirements, and modifying existing development standards to improve livability.
Meeting Location: Northgate Community Center, 10510 5th Ave NE, Seattle, WA 98125
